title: 303 40 "Boss Luffy is the Culprit? Track Down the Missing Great Cherry Tree!"Transliteration: "Hannin wa Rufi Oyabun? Kieta Ōzakura o Oe" (Japanese:犯人はルフィ親分? 消えた大桜を追え) Munehisa Sakai Hirohiko Kamisaka April 1, 2007(2007-04-01)[50] June 7, 2015
transformers_text: 303 40 Boss Luffy is the Culprit Track Down the Missing Great Cherry Tree Transliteration Hann in wa Ru fi Oya bun Ki eta za kura o Oe Japanese M une his a Sakai Hiro hi ko Kami saka April 1 2007 2007 04 01 50 June 7 2015 It is springtime in Grand Ji pang One day remains until the yearly town festival in which everyone gathers to have a picnic under the 1000 year old sakura tree Unfortunately one of the town's children is sick and cannot attend Luffy tries to think of a way to show him the tree in its bloom but does not come up with a solution When the tree disappears the next day Luffy becomes the prime suspect Robin investigates The truth is that Buggy and his men stole the tree and brought it aboard the ship of Foxy the Silver Fox She tips off Luffy Us opp and Sanji about the tree's location who go there to retrieve it
tf_idf_text: bos luffy culprit track miss great cherry tree transliteration hann oya bun eta kura japanese une sakai hiro kami saka april june springtime grand pang one day remain yearly town festival everyone gather picnic year old sakura tree unfortunately one town child sick cannot attend luffy try think way show tree bloom not come solution tree disappears next day luffy becomes prime suspect robin investigates truth buggy men steal tree bring aboard ship foxy silver fox tip luffy opp sanji tree location retrieve
